Keywords: Horsemen , Robot
Real Name: Danger Room
Special Powers
RALLY (6): Opposing Attack Rolls . At the beginning of your turn, you may remove one of Apocalypse's RALLY dice. If you do, give a friendly character that can use the Danger Room Construct trait an Error token and they gain Colossal damage symbol until your next turn.
DANGER ROOM CONSTRUCT: When Apocalypse makes an attack, after resolutions give him an Error token for each 1 in the attack roll (maximum 3). // If Apocalypse has 2 or less Error tokens, characters take a maximum of 1 damage from Apocalypse's attacks, Apocalypse takes a maximum of 1 damage from opponent's attacks, and he can't be healed or chosen for Mastermind. Protected: Pulse Wave.
LESSONS FROM THE DANGER ROOM: APOCALYPSE: If Apocalypse is KO'd by an opposing character, for the rest of the game, that character can use Cosmic Energy team ability.

Comments
August 6, 2022
gambitrmp
I just like that all 7(?) of these (counting the animated set ones) now come to an even 300 points. That said, I don't have the Animated set ones but the 4 from this set plus Danger at 124 makes a nifty 289. Not too shabby for a thematic way to use them.
July 7, 2022
Oathful
At first glance I was rather turned off by this dial. Lack of opening move-and-attack, lower range than I'd like and the fact he gives Cosmic TA to whoever kills him makes him look very dangerous to field (Although it would take 5 total hits to KO him, so you have some time). However, you have to think about the opportunities his Rally Dice open up and the support he'll have. A lot of the Danger Room figures can either move people around or hinder their ability to close the gap to help keep Apocalypse safe, on top of the fact that you can still field other robots, which is still one of the best keywords in the game. This is the kind of figure where if you can play around him he brings quite a lot to the table, but if not you you're shooting yourself in the foot. Thematic Dial: 7.5/10, Viability: 8/10 (mileage may vary), Fun Factor: 7/10, fairly balanced figure
